channel.title: Unemployment on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Unemployment on Rob Barry

item.title: For Government's Latest Figure, Check Back Next Week
item.description: The Labor Department has revised upward its first estimate of seasonally adjusted claims the following week in 57 of the past 58 reports, a Dow Jones analysis found Read the full story here.

item.title: Why Recent Job Gains May Stick This Time
item.description: The U.S. job market’s recent improvement has some economists wondering if 2012 will break from last year’s pattern of strong job growth in the winter followed by a slowing in the spring and summer. Read the full story here.
